long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace Google Chrome's default new tab page with a beautiful dashboard of customizable widgets.

You can see an overview of your day, upcoming meetings, your team's different time zones, the weather, your top links, and more.

- View an aggregate view of calendar events for the day 
- Search through your browser history, or search using Google and Perplexity
- Compare international time zones 
- See how old you are in days, months or years
- View the local weather report
- See top sites, and recent history

This extension is free, has no analytics tracking, and none of your data touches our servers.
